page.title: 06FAMILY LIFE IN NEWTON MEARNS
page.content: A typical weekday for a Newton Mearns family would begin at about 7.30am. By 8.30am most working adults are travelling to their places of employment while the children make their way to school where they remain till 4pm. Most families are reunited by 6.30pm to enjoy an evening meal and spend the evening together or in some form of recreational activity. Many parents will encourage and help their children with their schoolwork in the evening as there is a high degree of motivation towards education in the area. It could be said that many of the people in this area are involved in the 'rat-race' and 'keeping up with the Jones's' can be quite important to some families.
